job_details.Vacaturetitel: Google Cloud Engineer (GCD, Terraform, Azure Devops) (QR9836) , Amsterdam
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
For our client in Amsterdam, we are looking for a GoogleCloud Engineer (GCD, Terraform, Azure Devops)

   Your mission will be to ensure the improvement of our products with a team and supporting all countries in reaching their targets by providing smart advanced analytics solutions, to strengthen the clients leadership in digitalization & support our 40 million customers.

   We work in a fun and creative environment, and we're dedicated to bringing out the best in both our relations and our projects, ranging from enhancing our virtual assistants in production via innovative NLP techniques such as Generative AI and Large Language Models to building speech analytics use cases across all the countries our client operates in.

   The opportunity
   As a cloud solution engineer, you will be partnering with Data Analysts and Customer Journey Experts (CJE) to design and implement Google Cloud Native infrastructure for the use of leading-edge conversational AI products, such as a compliant generative AI chatbot. As a Cloud Engineer, you understand business needs, can architect GCP cloud solutions, understand data needs, and can inform on using the right cloud solutions to operationalize the conversational platform and thus increase our clients contact center agents' efficiencies. You can with the GCP APIs and code pipelines to support the team's needs. You can productize and perationalize (GCP) cloud-native applications for production environments., You Will Be Responsible For
   * Implementation and productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM technologies.
   * Advice on which Google Cloud Platform products to use.
   * Making cloud designs and technical decisions for conversational systems projects at clients Analytics.
   * Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow.
   * Implementing GCP native ML architectures.
   * Contributing to strengthening the cloud capability within the team.
   * Implementing Looker Dashboards, BigQuery datasets/views, and working with Vertex AI Search and Conversation API.
   * Writing code to interact with GCP API's.
   * Automation of team bottlenecks.
job_details.full_text:
Google Cloud Engineer (GCD, Terraform, Azure Devops) (QR9836) , Amsterdam

For our client in Amsterdam, we are looking for a GoogleCloud Engineer (GCD, Terraform, Azure Devops)

   Your mission will be to ensure the improvement of our products with a team and supporting all countries in reaching their targets by providing smart advanced analytics solutions, to strengthen the clients leadership in digitalization & support our 40 million customers.

   We work in a fun and creative environment, and we're dedicated to bringing out the best in both our relations and our projects, ranging from enhancing our virtual assistants in production via innovative NLP techniques such as Generative AI and Large Language Models to building speech analytics use cases across all the countries our client operates in.

   The opportunity
   As a cloud solution engineer, you will be partnering with Data Analysts and Customer Journey Experts (CJE) to design and implement Google Cloud Native infrastructure for the use of leading-edge conversational AI products, such as a compliant generative AI chatbot. As a Cloud Engineer, you understand business needs, can architect GCP cloud solutions, understand data needs, and can inform on using the right cloud solutions to operationalize the conversational platform and thus increase our clients contact center agents' efficiencies. You can with the GCP APIs and code pipelines to support the team's needs. You can productize and perationalize (GCP) cloud-native applications for production environments., You Will Be Responsible For
   * Implementation and productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM technologies.
   * Advice on which Google Cloud Platform products to use.
   * Making cloud designs and technical decisions for conversational systems projects at clients Analytics.
   * Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow.
   * Implementing GCP native ML architectures.
   * Contributing to strengthening the cloud capability within the team.
   * Implementing Looker Dashboards, BigQuery datasets/views, and working with Vertex AI Search and Conversation API.
   * Writing code to interact with GCP API's.
   * Automation of team bottlenecks.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes building and deploying applications using Generative AI and LLM technologies, including conversational AI products and chatbots. It involves implementing GCP-native ML architectures and working with specific GenAI tools like DialogFlow and Vertex AI Search, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.

strengthen the clients leadership in digitalization
support our 40 million customers
understand business needs
increase our clients contact center agents' efficiencies

phrases: Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow
BigQuery datasets/views
